snippet: Evans Bancorp reached an $825,000 settlement with Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman of New York after it was accused by the state of discriminatory lending practices.
abstract: Buffalo bank Evans Bancorp agrees to pay almost $1 million to settle lawsuit charging it with redlining; charge was brought by New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman.

byline.original: By JESSICA SILVER-GREENBERG and MICHAEL CORKERY

lead_paragraph: Evans Bancorp reached an $825,000 settlement with Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman of New York after it was accused by the state of discriminatory lending practices.

headline.main: Evans Bank Settles New York ‘Redlining’ Lawsuit
